title: Lost Cities of Ancient Lemuria and the Pacific (The Lost City Series)
description: Rogue adventurer and maverick archeologist Childress takes the reader on unforgettable journeys in search of lost cities and ancient mysteries. Join him as he crosses deserts, mountains and jungles in search of legendary cities, vast gold treasure, jungle pyramids, ancient seafarers, living dinosaurs and solutions to the fantastic mysteries of the past.
author: David Hatcher Childress
